channel.title: Primary - Alive in Jesus
channel.description: The Primary student guide is written with your child in mind. You'll find engaging Bible narratives, memorable activities, and so much more.
channel.itunes:summary: The Primary student guide is written with your child in mind. You'll find engaging Bible narratives, memorable activities, and so much more.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2026 General Conference of Seventh-day Adventists
channel.itunes:author: Sabbath School & PM

item.title: Lesson 4 – What Happened to God’s Beautiful Angel? (January 18-24)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 4 – What Happened to God’s Beautiful Angel? (January 18-24)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Primary, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 4
BIG IDEA: God gives me freedom to choose because He is love.
This week’s lesson is based on Isaiah 14:12-15; Ezekiel 28:2-19; The Great Controversy, pp. 492-504; and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 33-43.
Visit our website: https://aliveinjesus.info

item.title: Lesson 3 – The Sabbath (January 11-17)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 3 – The Sabbath (January 11-17)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Primary, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 3
BIG IDEA: God gave us the Sabbath and blessed it as a very special day to spend with Him.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 2:1-3; Exodus 20:8-10; Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 47, 48; and The Seventh-day Adventist Bible Commentary, vol. 1, pp. 220, 221.
Extra Reading: The Bible Story, vol. 1, pp. 57-60.
Visit our website: https://aliveinjesus.info

item.title: Lesson 2 – A Perfect Home (January 4-10)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 2 – A Perfect Home (January 4-10)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Primary, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 2
BIG IDEA: We are God’s very special creation, made in His image.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 1:24-31; 2:7-25; Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 45-51; and The Seventh-day Adventist Bible Commentary, vol. 1, pp. 214-217, 222-227.
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Lesson 1 – A New World (December 28-January 3)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 1 – A New World (December 28-January 3)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Primary, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 1
BIG IDEA: Our loving God made earth to be our wonderful home.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 1:1-23; Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 33, 44; The Story of Redemption, pp. 57-69; and The Seventh-day Adventist Bible Commentary, vol. 1, pp. 207-217. **Extra Reading:** The Bible Story, vol.1, pp. 21-34.
